sentences.en: "I shut him out of the bedroom," says Maureen.
sentences.cn: “我把他关在了卧室外面，”莫琳说。

sentences.en: Grace tapped on the bedroom door and went in.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝轻轻敲了敲卧室的门，走了进去。

sentences.en: He indicated the bedroom with a jerk of his head.
sentences.cn: 他扭头指了指卧室的方向。

sentences.en: He started for Dot's bedroom and Myrtle held him back.
sentences.cn: 他正要去多特的卧室，被默特尔拦住了。

sentences.en: Here is your opportunity to acquire a luxurious one bedroom home.
sentences.cn: 现在正是购买一套豪华一居室住房的机会。

sentences.en: James came out of his bedroom, toweling his wet hair.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯从卧室出来，用毛巾擦着他湿漉漉的头发。

sentences.en: Shaun was in the bedroom, out of earshot, watching television.
sentences.cn: 肖恩在卧室里看电视，听不见。

sentences.en: The boys are curled asleep in the small bedroom upstairs.
sentences.cn: 男孩们蜷缩在楼上的小卧室里睡熟了。

sentences.en: The droning murmur of the doctor's voice in the bedroom had ceased.
sentences.cn: 卧室里医生喋喋不休的低语声已经停下了。

sentences.en: The master bedroom has its own en suite bathroom.
sentences.cn: 主卧室带有独立卫生间。

sentences.en: The monthly rent for a two-bedroom flat would be £953.33.
sentences.cn: 双卧室的公寓每月房租是953.33英镑。

sentences.en: There was a heavy thudding noise against the bedroom door.
sentences.cn: 卧室门上发出一声沉重的撞击声。

sentences.en: We painted our table to match the window frame in the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们把桌子刷成与卧室窗框一致的颜色。

sentences.en: We would like to convert the loft into another bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们想把阁楼改造成又一间卧室。

sentences.en: Within minutes she was outside, closing her bedroom door tight behind her.
sentences.cn: 不出几分钟，她就出去了，并把卧室的门紧紧带上了。

phrases.tran_cn: 单人卧室；单人房；单人间
